title: Lost One Game in Promo and Was Dropped From Promo Series
body: Hello, I had lost the first game of my promo series and was for some reason dropped out of my promo series with two games left to play.  I was wondering if this could be restored with one lost game and two games left to play in my series.  I didn't lose my promo matches fairly, I only lost one of three.

replies.body: Even if we wanted to, we have 0 ability to edit or alter game stats.  Depending on which tier or division your promo was for, 2 losses could end it.  I looked into this for you personally, but it looks like you had a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) during your series.  Dodging counts as an auto losses, bundled with a lost game, ended the series.  You are at 99 LP currently, so give it your best shot and get back in that series!  Let me know if that clears things up!
